Title: Enacts the infant vision information, education and wellness program act
Summary: Enacts the Infant Vision Information, Education and Wellness Act; creates the newborn vision screening advisory committee; provides for newborn and infant vision screening; requires reporting.
LawCode: Add Art 25 Title II-B §§2559-g - 2559-l, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the infant vision information, education and wellness program
